channel.title: Tasks on Programming thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Tasks on Programming thoughts

item.description: Best practice (My rule) Implement things following open source standard: for example how to implement a log client PECS - “Producer - Extends, Consumer - Super”: The Get and Put Principle: use an extends wildcard when you only get values our of a structure, use a super wildcard when you only put values into a structure, and don’t use a wildcard you both get and put. (Java) Generally, it’s not a good practice to modify variables used in lambda expressions and anonymous classes.

Posts in progress Linux introduction: Ken Thompson: developed UNIX at Bell Labs Linux for newbies: advantages, why and how to study, installation, alternatives The PDP-7 was used by Thompson for first version of UNIX Linux definition by The Linux Information Project (LINFO) Famous quotations about Linux, by The Linux Information Project (LINFO) What is Linux? An in-depth introduction Intro To Linux [For Beginners] - DEV Linux shell Shell definition by The Linux Information Project (LINFO) How to change Shells by The Linux Information Project (LINFO)
